title: The Good food show. series 1
brief_description: Gabrielle Gate takes us through a series of episodes which focus not only on good eating but good health also. The emphasis is on freshness, quality and the excellence of Australian produce. Guest chefs appear on the programs to offer the viewer a range of delicious recipes and ideas. The programs on this tape are: The Great Australian dish; The Staff of life; Getting a good start and Pick of the crop.
